snippet: The two-time Olympic champion Seth Wescott won his first World Cup snowboardcross event in four years in a photo finish over Alex Pullin of Canada in Telluride, Colo.
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic champion Seth Wescott won his first World Cup snowboardcross event in four years in a photo finish over Alex Pullin of Canada in Telluride, Colo.

headline.main: Wescott Wins Close World Cup Snowboard Event
